citations.narrative:
An approximately 6 year old male ring-tailed lemur named "George" was in an enclosure that was 24 inches in height.
The facility representative felt this lemur weighed somewhere between 2.5-5 lbs. Given the approximate weight of the
lemur, the lemur is required to have an enclosure that measures 30 inches in height. Not having an enclosure that is of
sufficient height could cause stress for the animal. The animal must be housed in a primary enclosure that meets the
height requirement for its weight. Correct by 10/13/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End of report.
n

narrative:
3.80(b)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
An approximately 6 year old male ring-tailed lemur named "George" was in an enclosure that was 24 inches in height. 
The facility representative felt this lemur weighed somewhere between 2.5-5 lbs. Given the approximate weight of the 
lemur, the lemur is required to have an enclosure that measures 30 inches in height. Not having an enclosure that is of 
sufficient height could cause stress for the animal. The animal must be housed in a primary enclosure that meets the 
height requirement for its weight. Correct by 10/13/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
